statements: SELECT user_id, product_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM UserBehaviorAnalysis;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorAnalysis WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, event_type, user_id, event_timestamp FROM UserBehaviorAnalysis WHERE event_type = 'view';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM UserBehaviorAnalysis ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM UserBehaviorAnalysis GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, product_id, event_type FROM UserBehaviorAnalysis WHERE event_type = 'click' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM UserBehaviorAnalysis GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, product_id, event_type FROM UserBehaviorAnalysis WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id, event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(CASE WHEN event_type = 'purchase' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_purchases FROM UserBehaviorAnalysis GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;

SELECT user_id, MONTH(event_timestamp) AS month, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM UserBehaviorAnalysis WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY user_id, month ORDER BY user_id, month;
SELECT * FROM product_views WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, user_id FROM product_views WHERE view_timestamp >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_views FROM product_views GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT product_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_sales FROM purchases GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(purchase_timestamp) AS latest_purchase FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT product_id, user_id, view_timestamp FROM product_views WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY view_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS total_products_viewed FROM product_views GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_products_viewed > 5 ORDER BY total_products_viewed DESC;

SELECT p.user_id, pp.product_id, pp.purchase_amount, pp.purchase_timestamp FROM purchases pp JOIN product_views pv ON pp.product_id = pv.product_id AND pp.user_id = pv.user_id WHERE pp.purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY pp.purchase_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_purchases > 3 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM purchase_timestamp) = 5 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM purchase_timestamp) = 2021 ORDER BY purchase_timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, category FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT * FROM user_views ORDER BY view_timestamp DESC
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category='Electronics'
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category IN ('Clothing', 'Shoes') AND price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products JOIN user_views ON products.product_id = user_views.product_id WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY view_timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM products
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, username FROM products p JOIN users u ON p.product_id = u.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_views;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, count(*) AS views_count FROM product_views pv JOIN products p ON pv.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name ORDER BY views_count DESC;
SELECT u.username, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchases pu JOIN users u ON pu.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductViews WHERE event_type = 'click' ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_amount FROM Purchases WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_name ASC, email DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM Categories WHERE category_name IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing') ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProductViews WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM Products p JOIN Categories c ON p.product_id = c.category_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_views FROM ProductViews GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
